channel.title: Development on Jeff Smith
channel.link:
http://localhost:3000/categories/development/Recent content in Development on Jeff SmithHugo -- gohugo.ioen-usWed, 24 Jan 2018 00:00:00 +0000
Sparkjava or tomcat slow to start on cloud VMhttp://localhost:3000/notes/sparkjava-or-tomcat-slow-to-start-on-cloud-vm/Wed, 24 Jan 2018 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/sparkjava-or-tomcat-slow-to-start-on-cloud-vm/There might not be enough entropy from /dev/random causing blocking. Use a software solution like Haveged. Install haveged on ubuntu: sudo apt-get install haveged Check entropy on linux with: cat /proc/sys/kernel/random/entropy_avail
Enable git debugging on linux and windowshttp://localhost:3000/notes/enable-git-debugging-on-linux-and-windows/Wed, 15 Nov 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/enable-git-debugging-on-linux-and-windows/linux: export GIT_TRACE_PACKET=1 export GIT_TRACE=1 export GIT_CURL_VERBOSE=1 windows: set GIT_TRACE_PACKET=1 set GIT_TRACE=1 set GIT_CURL_VERBOSE=1
fatal: The remote end hung up unexpectedly pushing to githubhttp://localhost:3000/notes/fatal-the-remote-end-hung-up-unexpectedly-pushing-to-github/Tue, 07 Nov 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/fatal-the-remote-end-hung-up-unexpectedly-pushing-to-github/You need to increase the ssh/http buffers: git config --global http.postBuffer 524288000 git config --global ssh.postBuffer 524288000 From: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15240815/git-fatal-the-remote-end-hung-up-unexpectedly
git and hg clone with full windows path and ssh loginhttp://localhost:3000/notes/git-and-hg-clone-with-full-windows-path-and-ssh-login/Mon, 06 Nov 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/git-and-hg-clone-with-full-windows-path-and-ssh-login/git uses a single slash before path as in: dev.jeffsmithdev.com:62/C/repos/git/archived/example hg uses a double slash before path as in: dev.jeffsmithdev.com:62//C/repos/hg/archived/example
You need to install XCode 5.0.0http://localhost:3000/notes/you-need-to-install-xcode-5.0.0/Sat, 14 Oct 2017 00:00:00 +0000http://localhost:3000/notes/you-need-to-install-xcode-5.0.0/Run… sudo /usr/bin/xcode-select -switch /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer From: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/31554125/attempt-to-install-qt-on-os-x-gives-you-need-to-install-xcode-5-0-0-but-this
